thread.title: VMworld 2015: VMware Embraces Pivotal CF Microservices to Bundle Containers with Lightweight VMs
thread.title_full: VMworld 2015: VMware Embraces Pivotal CF Microservices to Bundle Containers with Lightweight VMs

author: Dunlap, Charlotte
title: VMworld 2015: VMware Embraces Pivotal CF Microservices to Bundle Containers with Lightweight VMs
text: September 01, 2015 Rate this report Intelligence Alert VMware is building a PaaS via containers, leveraging Pivotal Cloud Foundry, to fulfill a hybrid cloud offering that takes aim at IBM, Microsoft and Red Hat, and hoping to differentiate through its infrastructure roots.
